manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: TV Stand with Charging Station A Room without It Disorganized arrangement due to lack of suitable storage for storageThe clutter of charging cables is unsightly and easy to trip over.All kinds of things piled up, unable to find out what you want. A Room with It Utilize the storage function and place it neatly.The outlets and USB for fast charging, and neat charging lines.Each drawer can store different items, and you can find what you want at any time.

Extra Reinforced Safety Design A drilling binding design has been added for safer. When the children pull it while playing, will not fall down. Adjustable Knob Adjustable non-skid feet will not scratch the floor, and they are adjustable for uneven surfaces. Fabric Drawers The fabric drawer is made of hard-wearing cationic fabric, which is smooth, flat and durable. Removable & Foldable Drawers Removable drawers fold flat for easy storage when not in use — The entire unit is portable, lightweight and easy to relocate to different spaces.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and easy to build
reviews.reviewText: This was a really good quality and good price. It was easy to put together, but I did need 2 of the back up pieces (they send an extra of every screw, etc so it was great to have them on hand). The wooden top makes this a great product. Drawers are as expected, hard pop up with a reinforced bottom. I compared a lot of similar items, glad I picked this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits perfect for my application
reviews.reviewText: Measured beforehand and determined this should fit well where I wanted it to go and it did. Assembly was straightforward and the instructions were easy to follow. Nothing was missing and even had extra hardware. The dresser itself is plenty sturdy loaded up with clothes and the drawers slide out and in easy. The outlet strip and usb ports are an added bonus. Nice dresser to have clothes storage and some space to display. Happy I decided on this one

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Responsable seller, great customer service.
reviews.reviewText: Initially, very disappointed, it was impossible to screw it since some of the parts were missing the holes to pass the screws. Also, the product came with a terrible odor, it really smells like trash due to the material use on the drawers. Contacted customer services, sent pictures of the issues as they ordered the parts and gave me some tips on getting rid of the smell. Even do we tried with almost every product on the market and left the drawers out during the night, the smell never left. Contacted customer service again and they sent me a new one. For what you pay, its decent size and sturdy, drawers are ok. Very happy with the purchase overall and glad this vendor takes customer satisfaction seriously. It’s a good low budget alternative and the design is nice and you get 8 small size drawers. Looks good. Definitively, I will buy from this seller again, they were very responsible.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this dresser!
reviews.reviewText: This is a wonderful piece of furniture! It works perfectly as an accompanying piece to my chest of drawers. It was easy to assemble. The drawers slide in/out with ease. The 2 plugs and USB ports are so convenient. I love the colors, the woodgrain and black goes great with my other bedroom furniture! And it's just the right size and height. I'm looking at purchasing a similar nightstand. I would definitely purchase again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent product, nice quality
reviews.reviewText: I was able to assemble the entire thing by myself in a couple of hours. I took my time. The instructions were very clear with pictures to make sure you put it together in the correct way. One really nice thing was that it came with extra hardware. Due to it's size and me putting it on carpet, it's not the sturdiest (not a negative - just a placement thing) but I'm not concerned about tipping over or anything like that. Footprint is not very large but it has a decent amount of surface area and drawer space. One thing to consider when deciding on placement....if you plan to have an outlet directly behind the unit then you will not be able to place it flush up against the wall without having one of the drawers sticking out a little. Not a major thing as you only need to put it a couple inches from the wall. Just a point to consider when deciding on location.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars FUN LITTLE DRESSER FOR SMALL SPACE
reviews.reviewText: This dresser is perfect for a small room that can't accommodate a full-sized dresser comfortably. With a 12-inch depth, it has a very narrow footprint, yet it is sturdy and doesn't look very small. I love the tiered shelf design, adds a little fun to the dresser and the space. The charging station on top is a cool little extra as well.If you plan to put a TV on top of this dresser, the shelf will only accommodate a 32" TV. I opted to mount a larger TV above the dresser instead, and it looks nice. I don't know how long the fabric drawers will last, but they look nice and are fairly sturdy. It's a good value for the price, and it doesn't look cheap.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Not as sturdy as I would have wanted but still pretty near perfect
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the ODK Dresser with Charging Station for my bedroom, and overall, I'm quite pleased with the purchase. The 52'' length provides ample storage space, and the addition of the charging station is a convenient feature that I appreciate.However, I must note that the dresser is not as sturdy as I would have wanted. While it's not a deal-breaker, it's worth mentioning. The assembly process was straightforward, and the dresser looks aesthetically pleasing in my bedroom. The charging station is a thoughtful touch, keeping my devices organized and ready to go.Despite the slight concern about sturdiness, the dresser still meets most of my expectations. The design is attractive, the storage capacity is practical, and the charging station adds a modern and functional element. It's a near-perfect fit for my bedroom, providing both style and utility.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It fits very well on the space I had in mind.Easy to install and overall very pretty
